description: Meet Oscar! 4 months old Golden Retriever. Playful, friendly, outgoing. Favorite game; fetch.
Meet Mia! 1 year old British Shorthair. Calm, easygoing. Favorite game; catching fish on the tablet.
Meet Murphy! 7 months old German Shephard. Energetic, intelligent. Favorite game; swimming.
Meet Buster! 3 years old Maine Coon. Social, talkative. Favorite game; playing with toilet paper roll.
